channel.title: Firefall
channel.description: Anyone played this? This weekend I'll be playing the beta. I'm actually kinda excited for it.

item.title: Firefall
item.dc:creator: Dreadmoth
item.description:
I played a little of the beta a while back - seems like it could be fun, but without local servers the latency is so bad that it makes the game pretty much unplayable.
(the situation may have improved since then)
